15.3. Develop a Grid Search Framework 297
are calculated for each conﬁg, the list of conﬁgurations is sorted in ascending order so that the
best scores are listed ﬁrst. The complete function is listed below.
# grid search configs
def grid_search(data, cfg_list, n_test):
# evaluate configs
scores = scores = [score_model(data, n_test, cfg) for cfg in cfg_list]
# sort configs by error, asc
scores.sort(key=lambda tup: tup[1])
return scores
